languages.text: "Боюсь, данная мода не дошла до наших краев. Уверена, это замечательное развлечение, но я не хотела бы испортить портрет по неопытности".
"I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."
languages.original_text: "Боюсь, данная мода не дошла до наших краев. Уверена, это замечательное развлечение, но я не хотела бы испортить портрет по неопытности".

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that this fashion never made it to Eurac V. It is, doubtlessly, a riveting pastime, however, I would not wish to ruin the portrait due to inexperience."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say that this fashion never made it to Eurac V. It is, doubtlessly, a riveting pastime, however, I would not wish to ruin the portrait due to inexperience."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Malheureusement, cette coutume ne s'est pas implantée sur Eurac-V. Je ne doute pas du mérite artistique des portraits, mais je n'ai pas assez d'expérience pour m'y essayer. »
languages.original_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, cette coutume ne s'est pas implantée sur Eurac-V. Je ne doute pas du mérite artistique des portraits, mais je n'ai pas assez d'expérience pour m'y essayer. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Lamento decir que tales tradiciones nunca llegaron a Eurac V. No me cabe duda de que los retratos son obras artísticas muy respetables, pero carezco de la experiencia necesaria para intentar realizar uno».
languages.original_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento decir que tales tradiciones nunca llegaron a Eurac V. No me cabe duda de que los retratos son obras artísticas muy respetables, pero carezco de la experiencia necesaria para intentar realizar uno».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “很遗憾，欧拉克五号星从来都没有过这样的传统。我很确信，画肖像画是有价值的艺术创作，但我经验不足，无法尝试。”
languages.original_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，欧拉克五号星从来都没有过这样的传统。我很确信，画肖像画是有价值的艺术创作，但我经验不足，无法尝试。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そのような風潮がユーラック・Vまで届かなかったのは残念です。肖像画を描くことは、芸術的な取り組みとして価値があります。ですが、私が挑戦するには経験が足りません」
languages.original_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."

traits.locale_text: 「そのような風潮がユーラック・Vまで届かなかったのは残念です。肖像画を描くことは、芸術的な取り組みとして価値があります。ですが、私が挑戦するには経験が足りません」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Leider haben es derlei Traditionen nie bis nach Eurac V geschafft. Ein Porträt zu malen, ist gewiss ein würdiges künstlerisches Unterfangen, jedoch keines das ich erfahren genug bin zu versuchen."
languages.original_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."

traits.locale_text: "Leider haben es derlei Traditionen nie bis nach Eurac V geschafft. Ein Porträt zu malen, ist gewiss ein würdiges künstlerisches Unterfangen, jedoch keines das ich erfahren genug bin zu versuchen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki bu tür gelenekler, Eurac V'e hiç ulaşmamış. Eminim portre resmetmek saygın bir sanatsal çabadır ancak ben böyle bir şeye teşebbüs edebilecek kadar deneyim sahibi değilim."
languages.original_text: "I regret to say such traditions never made it to Eurac V. I am sure painting a portrait is a worthy artistic endeavour, but it is not one I am experienced enough to attempt."
